original_title: Sex Tapes with Sandy & Anita Pearl
overview: Sandy, the Queen of lesbian erotica as you've never seen her before in her first genuine sex tape. She invites her stunning friend Anita Pearl over to her apartment for a sex session that has to be seen to be believed. No crew, no cameraman, just two girls with a camera getting it on in the privacy of their own home.
title: Sex Tapes with Sandy & Anita Pearl
